title: "An Unknown DirectX Error has occured and League of Legends cannot Start"
body:
I've tried to play league on my laptop and this error keeps coming up. 

Solutions I've tried: 

1. Going into LocalDisk/Riot Games/League of Legends/Config and deleting the Game file and PersistedSettings. 

2. Deleting both the Lol_game_cilent files and operating a repair on the game. 

3. Opening the Game File and changing from WindowMode=0 to WindowMode=1

4. "Updated" my drivers. 

5. Praying to Vishnu and asking him to forgive me for eating cows. 

Can you guys help me out please?

replies.body:
This could be caused by Windows being out of date or corrupt drivers or associated software packages. I recommend first updating Windows, then grabbing a fresh install in your DirectX components with [this web installer.](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?displayLang=en&id=35)

Let me know if this issue persists.
